text.1: Oh! hello new Node, nice to meet you. I'm **Topaz**!
text.3a: Welcome to the **Topaz Space Station**, center of intergalactic blockchain activity. All the technology here—from transactions to security—is directly connected to the blockchain network that I manage.
text.4a: Err… well, maybe because of a little mistake in the past… ahahaha.
text.5: But don't worry, I'm now acting as the main network. My creators built this place as a unified ecosystem, and your role is critical to maintaining economic stability, network security, and the expansion of this galaxy.
text.6: Here, you can explore planets and asteroids to find resources and chests containing rewards. Fight extraterrestrial threats to protect the blockchain network. Collect exclusive coins/tokens and NFTs to strengthen your role in the universe.
